_**Agent (claude-opus-4-5-20251101 2026-02-03 13:50:12Z)**_

Done. I've created:

**1. `dot_config/uv/uv.toml.tmpl`** - UV config that conditionally sets the Tsinghua PyPI mirror:
```toml
# https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/configuration-files/

{{- if .useChineseMirror }}
# Use Tsinghua PyPI mirror for faster downloads in China
index-url = "https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple"
{{- end }}
```

**2. Updated `.chezmoi.toml.tmpl`** - Added a new prompt:
```
useChineseMirror = {{ promptBoolOnce . "useChineseMirror" "Are you in China (behind GFW) and need to use mirrors" false }}
```

When you run `chezmoi init`, it will now ask:
- "Are you in China (behind GFW) and need to use mirrors?" (default: false)

If answered `true`, the UV config at `~/.config/uv/uv.toml` will contain the Tsinghua mirror URL. Otherwise, it will be empty (using default PyPI).

_**User (2026-02-03 14:19:35Z)**_

I found that maybe we are using legacy syntax, please update our @dot_config/uv/uv.toml.tmpl 

```
❯  So the syntax is correct?                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/configuration-files/                                                                                                                                                                                  
  (don't we need the `[[tool.uv.index]]` or `[[index]]` stuff? why?)                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
⏺ Let me check the documentation to clarify the syntax options.                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
⏺ Fetch(https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/configuration-files/)                                                                                                                                                                           
  ⎿  Received 67.8KB (200 OK)                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
⏺ Good question! Your current syntax works but it's the legacy pip-compatible syntax. Here's the distinction:                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  Your current config (works for uv pip commands):                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  index-url = "https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple"                                                                                                                                                                                   
  This is shorthand that affects uv pip subcommands only.                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  Recommended modern syntax for uv.toml:                                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  [[index]]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
  url = "https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple"                                                                                                                                                                                         
  default = true                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  When to use [[tool.uv.index]]:                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  Only in pyproject.toml (not in uv.toml):                                                                                                                                                                                                 
  [[tool.uv.index]]                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
  url = "https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple"                                                                                                                                                                                         
  default = true                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  Why yours works:                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  - index-url is a pip-compatibility setting recognized by uv                                                                                                                                                                              
  - It applies to uv pip install, uv pip compile, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                     
  - The test we ran used uv pip install, so it worked                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  When you'd need [[index]]:                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  - For uv sync, uv lock, uv add and other non-pip commands                                                                                                                                                                                
  - For more advanced setups (multiple indexes, named indexes, authentication)                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  If you only use uv pip commands, your current config is fine. If you use uv sync/uv lock/uv add, consider updating to the [[index]] syntax.
```
(as well as `[tool.uv.pip]`)

---

_**Agent (claude-opus-4-5-20251101 2026-02-03 14:20:23Z)**_

<tool-use data-tool-type="read" data-tool-name="Read"><details>
<summary>Tool use: **Read**</summary>
 `./dot_config/uv/uv.toml.tmpl`

```text
     1→# https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/configuration-files/
     2→
     3→{{- if .useChineseMirror }}
     4→# Use Tsinghua PyPI mirror for faster downloads in China
     5→# https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/pypi/
     6→
     7→# Modern syntax for uv sync, uv lock, uv add, etc.
     8→[[index]]
     9→url = "https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple"
    10→default = true
    11→
    12→# Legacy pip-compatible syntax for uv pip commands
    13→[pip]
    14→index-url = "https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple"
    15→{{- end }}
    16→
```
</details></tool-use>
